page.title: 09Children's Hobbies -Guides
page.content: by Lucy Denham I go to guides every Wednesday. I belong to the 4th Weybridge guides.When we get there we get into patrols.The patrols are swallows, robins, chaffinches and kingfishers. I am in kingfishers. We wear a blue shirt and a dark blue skirt. When we join we have to say our promise which goes like this:- I promise that I will do my best; to do my duty to God ;to serve the Queen; to help other people and to keep the guide law. We earn interest badges by doing tasks. We sew our badges on either arm.Our 4th Weybridge badge is at the top of one arm. We have badges for certain stages of achievement. They are yellow, blue, red and green trefoil badges. We join guides at the age of ten and leave aged 14 or 15.
